USB::S_usb_endpoint_descriptor

USB::S_usb_endpoint_descriptor Struct Reference

This structure is the standard endpoint descriptor. It contains the necessary information for the host to determine the bandwidth required by the endpoint. More...

uchar bInterval
 Interval for polling endpoint fordata transfers.

Detailed Description

This structure is the standard endpoint descriptor. It contains the necessary information for the host to determine the bandwidth required by the endpoint.

See also:
USB Specification 2.0 - Section 9.6.6
